testsuite.name: com.puce.NakanoStay.services.EmailServiceTest

testcase.name: should handle booking with multiple rooms()
should send email to correct recipients()
should throw exception when booking has no details()
should throw exception when hotel is null()
should process correct templates for user and hotel()
